name: Ludum Arca
description:
Strongly recommended to play on Firefox to minimize lag.

Please be patient as the game may take a while to load. After it has finished loading, make sure to press the fullscreen button.

WASD to move, Space to jump, E to interact with objects (mirrors, levers, arcade machine, etc.), R to reset statue pushing game.

- Play the magic arcade game!

-Solve the puzzles!

- Find the relinquere lapis!
